title: Lyft Raises Guidance, Reports Increased Revenue
text:
Lyft Inc. raised its outlook for the year and built on recent Wall Street momentum with results that showed a 63% increase in revenue and more earnings per rider using its ride-hailing app.

The results prompted Lyft to improve its full-year guidance for the second quarter in a row. The company said it expects annual revenue of $3.57 billion to $3.58 billion, up from $3.47 billion to $3.50 billion. It trimmed its estimate for adjusted annual losses of $708 million to $718 million, compared with previous guidance of $850 million...
description: Lyft raised its outlook for the year and built on recent Wall Street momentum with results that showed a 63% increase in revenue and more earnings per rider using its ride-hailing app.
